SEARCH
Package adris.altoclef.util.helpers

Interface LookHelper

public interface LookHelper
Helper functions to interpret and change our player's look direction

  • Method Details

    • getReach

      static Optional<baritone.api.utils.Rotation> getReach(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos target, net.minecraft.util.math.Direction side)
      Calculate the reachable rotation for a given target and side.
      Parameters:
      target - the target block position
      side - the side direction
      Returns:
      an optional rotation if reachable, otherwise empty

    • getReach

      static Optional<baritone.api.utils.Rotation> getReach(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos target)
      Gets the reach for a given target position.
      Parameters:
      target - The target position.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Rotation if reach is possible, or an empty Optional otherwise.

    • raycast

      static net.minecraft.util.hit.EntityHitResult raycast(net.minecraft.entity.Entity from, net.minecraft.entity.Entity to, double reachDistance)
      Calculates a raycast from one entity to another.
      Parameters:
      from - The entity from which the raycast originates.
      to - The entity at which the raycast is aimed.
      reachDistance - The maximum distance the raycast can reach.
      Returns:
      The result of the raycast.

    • seesPlayer

      static boolean seesPlayer(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.entity.Entity player, double maxRange, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d entityOffset, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d playerOffset)
      Check if an entity can see a player within a certain range, taking into account entity and player offsets.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check.
      player - The player entity to check against.
      maxRange - The maximum range within which the entity can see the player.
      entityOffset - The offset of the entity.
      playerOffset - The offset of the player.
      Returns:
      True if the entity can see the player, false otherwise.

    • seesPlayer

      static boolean seesPlayer(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.entity.Entity player, double maxRange)
      Determines if the given entity can see the player within the specified range.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to check visibility from
      player - the player entity to check visibility to
      maxRange - the maximum range within which the player can be seen
      Returns:
      true if the player is visible within the specified range, false otherwise

    • cleanLineOfSight

      static boolean cleanLineOfSight(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d start, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d end, double maxRange)
      Checks if there is a clear line of sight between the start and end points for the given entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check line of sight for.
      start - The starting position of the line of sight.
      end - The ending position of the line of sight.
      maxRange - The maximum range for the line of sight.
      Returns:
      true if there is a clear line of sight, false otherwise.

    • cleanLineOfSight

      static boolean cleanLineOfSight(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d end, double maxRange)
      Checks if there is a clear line of sight between an entity and a specified location.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity from which to check the line of sight.
      end - The end location to check the line of sight to.
      maxRange - The maximum range at which the line of sight can be checked.
      Returns:
      True if there is a clear line of sight, false otherwise.

    • cleanLineOfSight

      static boolean cleanLineOfSight(net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d end, double maxRange)
      Checks if there is a clear line of sight between the player and a given point.
      Parameters:
      end - The end point to check for line of sight.
      maxRange - The maximum range to check for line of sight.
      Returns:
      True if there is a clear line of sight, false otherwise.

    • cleanLineOfSight

      static boolean cleanLineOfSight(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos block, double maxRange)
      Checks if there is a clear line of sight between an entity and a block position within a given maximum range.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity from which the line of sight is checked.
      block - The block position to check the line of sight to.
      maxRange - The maximum range to check for line of sight.
      Returns:
      True if there is a clear line of sight, false otherwise.

      Parameters:
      rotation - the Rotation object to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding Vec3d object
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the rotation is null

      Performs a raycast from the start point to the end point within a maximum range.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity performing the raycast
      start - the starting point of the raycast
      end - the ending point of the raycast
      maxRange - the maximum range of the raycast
      Returns:
      the result of the raycast

    • raycast

      static net.minecraft.util.hit.BlockHitResult raycast(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d end, double maxRange)
      Performs a raycast from the entity's camera position to the specified end point with a maximum range.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity performing the raycast
      end - The end point of the raycast
      maxRange - The maximum range of the raycast
      Returns:
      The result of the raycast

      static baritone.api.utils.Rotation getLookRotation(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity)
      Get the look rotation of an entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to get the look rotation for
      Returns:
      the look rotation of the entity

    • getLookRotation

      static baritone.api.utils.Rotation getLookRotation()
      Retrieves the look rotation of the player. If the player is null, returns a default rotation of (0, 0).
      Returns:
      The look rotation of the player.

    • getCameraPos

      static net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d getCameraPos(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity)
      Retrieves the camera position of the given entity. If the entity is a player and is sneaking, the sneaking eye position is inferred. Otherwise, the default camera position of the entity is returned.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity for which to retrieve the camera position.
      Returns:
      The camera position of the entity.

    • getCameraPos

      static net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d getCameraPos(AltoClef mod)
      Retrieves the camera position vector of the player.
      Parameters:
      mod - The instance of the AltoClef mod.
      Returns:
      The camera position vector.

    • getLookCloseness

      static double getLookCloseness(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d pos)
      Calculates the closeness between an entity's look direction and a given position.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to calculate the closeness for.
      pos - The position to compare the look direction to.
      Returns:
      The closeness value between the look direction and the position.

    • tryAvoidingInteractable

      static boolean tryAvoidingInteractable(AltoClef mod)
      Tries to avoid colliding with an interactable object. If a collision is detected, the function randomly changes the orientation and returns false. If no collision is detected, the function returns true.
      Parameters:
      mod - The AltoClef object.
      Returns:
      True if no collision is detected, false otherwise.

    • randomOrientation

      static void randomOrientation()
      Sets a random orientation for the given mod.

    • isLookingAt

      static boolean isLookingAt(AltoClef mod, baritone.api.utils.Rotation rotation)
      Checks if the given rotation is close to the current look rotation.
      Parameters:
      mod - The instance of the AltoClef class.
      rotation - The rotation to compare with the current look rotation.
      Returns:
      True if the rotation is close to the current look rotation, false otherwise.

    • isLookingAt

      static boolean isLookingAt(AltoClef mod, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
      Check if the player is looking at a specific block position.
      Parameters:
      mod - The instance of the AltoClef mod.
      pos - The block position to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player is looking at the given block position, false otherwise.

    • lookAt

      static void lookAt(AltoClef mod, baritone.api.utils.Rotation rotation, boolean withBaritone)
      Updates the player's look direction and rotation.
      Parameters:
      mod - The instance of AltoClef.
      rotation - The desired rotation to look at.
      withBaritone - Whether to use Baritone to look.

    • lookAt

      Updates the player's look direction and rotation.
      Parameters:
      rotation - The desired rotation to look at.

    • lookAt

      static void lookAt(AltoClef mod, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d toLook, boolean withBaritone)
      Adjusts the player's look direction to the specified target position.
      Parameters:
      mod - The AltoClef instance.
      toLook - The position to look at.
      withBaritone - Whether to use Baritone to look.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if mod or toLook is null.

    • lookAt

      Adjusts the player's look direction to the specified target position.
      Parameters:
      mod - The AltoClef instance.
      toLook - The position to look at.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if mod or toLook is null.

      Parameters:

      toLook - The position to look at.
      side - The direction to look from.
      withBaritone - Whether to use Baritone to look.

    • getLookRotation

      static baritone.api.utils.Rotation getLookRotation(AltoClef mod, net.minecraft.util.math.Vec3d toLook)
      Calculates the rotation needed for a player to look at a specified point.
      Parameters:
      mod - The instance of the main mod class.
      toLook - The coordinates to look at.
      Returns:
      The rotation needed to look at the specified point.

    • getLookRotation

      static baritone.api.utils.Rotation getLookRotation(AltoClef mod, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos toLook)
      Returns the rotation needed to look at a specified position.
      Parameters:
      mod - The AltoClef mod instance.
      toLook - The position to look at, specified by its BlockPos.
      Returns:
      The Rotation object representing the rotation needed to look at the position.
